languages.text: Исключением был лишь Соломон Антар, по возможности посещавший бывшего командира. Неизвестно, о чем они вели свои долгие беседы, но каждый раз итог был один — мрачная печать сожалений, безошибочно различимая на лицах суровых мужчин.

The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.
languages.original_text: Исключением был лишь Соломон Антар, по возможности посещавший бывшего командира. Неизвестно, о чем они вели свои долгие беседы, но каждый раз итог был один — мрачная печать сожалений, безошибочно различимая на лицах суровых мужчин.

traits.locale_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior when he got the chance. The content of their long conversations in unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy mark of regret unmistakable on each of the two dour men's faces.

The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

languages.text: Einzige Ausnahme war Solomorne Anthar, der seinen früheren Vorgesetzten besuchte, so oft er Zeit dazu fand. Die Inhalte ihrer langen Gespräche sind unbekannt, aber das Ende war immer das gleiche: Die beiden mürrischen Männer hatten eine düstere Miene und waren unverkennbar voller Bedauern.
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: Einzige Ausnahme war Solomorne Anthar, der seinen früheren Vorgesetzten besuchte, so oft er Zeit dazu fand. Die Inhalte ihrer langen Gespräche sind unbekannt, aber das Ende war immer das gleiche: Die beiden mürrischen Männer hatten eine düstere Miene und waren unverkennbar voller Bedauern.

languages.text: La seule exception notable était Solomorne Anthar, qui rendait visite à son ancien supérieur dès qu'il en avait l'occasion. Bien que personne n'ait été témoin de leurs longues conversations, ils en sortaient tous deux avec un air morose imprégné de bien des regrets.
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: La seule exception notable était Solomorne Anthar, qui rendait visite à son ancien supérieur dès qu'il en avait l'occasion. Bien que personne n'ait été témoin de leurs longues conversations, ils en sortaient tous deux avec un air morose imprégné de bien des regrets.

languages.text: 唯一的例外是索罗蒙·安萨，他一有机会就会去拜访他的前任上司。两人谈话的内容无人知晓，但每次长谈结束之后，两个人都表情阴郁，脸上带着明显的遗憾之色。
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: 唯一的例外是索罗蒙·安萨，他一有机会就会去拜访他的前任上司。两人谈话的内容无人知晓，但每次长谈结束之后，两个人都表情阴郁，脸上带着明显的遗憾之色。

languages.text: La única excepción era Solomorne Anthar, que visitaba a su antiguo superior siempre que tenía ocasión. Se desconocen los contenidos de sus largas conversaciones, pero el resultado era siempre el mismo: una muestra inconfundible de arrepentimiento y pesadumbre en el rostro de ambos hombres adustos.
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: La única excepción era Solomorne Anthar, que visitaba a su antiguo superior siempre que tenía ocasión. Se desconocen los contenidos de sus largas conversaciones, pero el resultado era siempre el mismo: una muestra inconfundible de arrepentimiento y pesadumbre en el rostro de ambos hombres adustos.

languages.text: 唯一の例外はソロモーン・アンサールで、彼は機会があるたびにかつての上司を訪ねていた。彼らの長い会話の内容は知られていないが、その結末はいつも同じだった。陰鬱で明らかな後悔の表情が、二人の陰気な男たちの顔に浮かんでいた。
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: 唯一の例外はソロモーン・アンサールで、彼は機会があるたびにかつての上司を訪ねていた。彼らの長い会話の内容は知られていないが、その結末はいつも同じだった。陰鬱で明らかな後悔の表情が、二人の陰気な男たちの顔に浮かんでいた。

languages.text: Tek istisna, fırsat buldukça eski amirini ziyaret eden Solomorne Anthar'dı. Bu uzun sohbetler sırasında neler konuşulduğu bilinmiyordu fakat sonuçları her seferinde aynıydı: Çatık kaşlı iki adamın da yüzünden okunan kasvet ve pişmanlık hissiyatı.
languages.original_text: The only exception was Solomorne Anthar, who visited his former superior whenever he had the chance. The contents of their long conversations are unknown, but their outcome was the same every time: a gloomy and unmistakable mark of regret on each of the two dour men's faces.

traits.locale_text: Tek istisna fırsat buldukça eski amirini ziyaret eden Solomorne Anthar'dı. Bu uzun sohbetler sırasında neler konuşulduğu bilinmiyordu fakat sonuçları her seferinde aynıydı: Çatık kaşlı iki adamın da yüzünden okunan kasvet ve pişmanlık hissiyatı.
